name: Satya Sri Virinchi Junuthula
headline: Software Development Engineer, AWS EC2 Auto Scaling
summary: Builder focused on resilient cloud-native experiences, currently crafting data-driven scaling workflows for AWS EC2 Auto Scaling. Passionate about purposeful UX, thoughtful automation, and bridging product goals with measurable engineering impact.

experience.title: Software Development Engineer
highlights: Shipped Bake Time and ODCR support across all AWS regions, aligning instance refresh flows with enterprise change controls.
Implemented attribute-based instance selection covering 15+ EC2 dimensions, driving a 20% adoption increase for stateful fleets.
Raised accessibility and observability for the AnyScale widget via CloudWatch dashboards, intuitive search, and policy automation.
Rolled strict null checks across the ASG console, eliminating 6000+ potential runtime defects while maintaining 90% coverage.

experience.title: Software Development Engineer
highlights: Built Concept Explorer dashboards to surface multi-account simulation health, unlocking 20% ops efficiency gains.
Delivered simulation lifecycle controls with auto-save, clone, and templating workflows, reducing setup time by 40%.
Designed accessible multi-format file workflows and end-to-end telemetry, shrinking performance investigation time by 30%.

experience.title: Machine Learning Engineer
highlights: Crafted an appointment booking chatbot UX with GPT/BERT backed NLU, boosting successful scheduling by 90%.
Led ASR enablement for Fox Sports showcases, achieving 82% transcription accuracy with hybrid data synthesis.

experience.title: Fullstack Web Developer
highlights: Launched a drag-and-drop WhatsApp chatbot builder with multi-language and multi-bot orchestration.
Integrated real-time agent handoff and analytics, driving 40% engagement uplift across a global user base.

education.school: Birla Institute of Technology and Science, Pilani

spotlight.description: Built a GPU-accelerated anomaly engine that flags dataset drift in minutes with explainability overlays.

spotlight.description: Redesigned distributed tracing with WASM sidecars, reducing noisy cardinality while boosting query speed 3x.

spotlight.description: Crafted an immersive sandbox where engineers remix synthetic traffic and chaos scripts before shipping.
